H0.text: Camouflage is the adaptation that helps prey hide and predators sneak up on prey.

H1.text: Scent is an adaptation that helps prey hide and predators sneak up on prey.

H2.text: Claws are an adaptation that helps prey hide and predators sneak up on prey.

H3.text: Variation is an adaptation that helps prey hide and predators sneak up on prey.

A4.text: prey develops anti-predator adaptations such as warning coloration, alarm calls and other signals, camouflage, mimicry of well-defended species, and defensive spines and chemicals
